Description:
Required Qualifications, Skills and Capabilities:Min 3+ Years of experience. Bachelors Degree is required.
Highly motivated self-starter with a proactive approach.
Team player with good communication skills.
Ability to operate in a flexible and dynamic environment.
Excellent analytical thinking: Ability to quickly understand complex issues and react effectively.
Experience of driving change to improve team processes, deliver efficiency and/or reduce risk.
Relevant experience working in Operations will be an advantage.  Job Responsibilities:Communicate effectively with internal and external parties to answer queries and resolve issues
Ability to understand, interpret and resolve queries pertaining to Client Documentations. 
Work closely with Onshore, Front office and Technology group for issue resolution. 
Work on Client Mandates in a time driven approach to ensure client is able to sign the same.
Foster a collaborative and inclusive environment that supports growth and development.
Exercise sound judgment; act with integrity; protect our company, clients, and customers.JPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.

We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. In accordance with applicable law, we make reasonable accommodations for applicants’ and employees’ religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs.Job Details
